alert.note: Alert for Cocke; Grainger; Greene; Hamblen; Jefferson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 03 at 6:48PM CDT until July 03 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... North Central Cocke County in east Tennessee... Central Grainger County in east Tennessee... West Central Greene County in east Tennessee... Hamblen County in east Tennessee... Northern Jefferson County in east Tennessee... * Until 1045 PM EDT. * At 748 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Morristown, Jefferson City, Rutledge, Bean Station, White Pine, New Market, Russellville, Mosheim, Alpha, Panther Creek State Park, Lowland, Buffalo Springs, Mohawk and Joppa. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
